title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 651 - Public Assistance Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 651 - Public Assistance Reports

State Regulations
§ 651.1 - Federal programs (quarterly report)
§ 651.2 - State programs (annual report)
§ 651.3 - Annual report on concurrent receipt of public assistance and OASDI
§ 651.4 - Statistical report of medical care, services and supplies provided through medical assistance vendor payments
§ 651.5 - State charges (monthly report)
§ 651.6 - Annual report on fraud cases
§ 651.7 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 651

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 37, 363-a; L. 1997, ch. 436, § 149

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
